div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1785 Basra, in anc. Characene, c. 1860 (129) Burial: c. 57 B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: AR Sinatruces: tetradr. (as Sellwood 31) Phraates III: tetradr. (as Sellwood 39) Disposition: Berlin? (ex Prokesch-Osten) Prokesch-Osten, Les monnaies des rots parthes (Paris, 1874-5), p. 18 Le Rider, Suse, p. 394, note 2 Simonetta, NC 1966, p. 27 The drachms and bronze coins listed by Prokesch-Osten are not part of the hd., which consisted of tetradrachms only
